llpml:
論理演算 2
var a = -1, b = 0, c = 1; printfln("(a, b, c) = (%d, %d, %d)", a, b, c);
printfln("%d: a > b", a > b); printfln("%d: b > a", b > a);
%d: a > b > c a, b, c
%d: c > b > a c, b, a
%d: b > 0 > a b, 0, a
printfln("%d: a >= b", a >= b); printfln("%d: b >= a", b >= a);
%d: a >= b >= c a, b, c
%d: c >= b >= a c, b, a
%d: b >= 0 >= a b, 0, a
printfln("%d: a < b", a lt b); printfln("%d: b < a", b lt a);
%d: a < b < c a, b, c
%d: c < b < a c, b, a
%d: a < 0 < b a, 0, b
printfln("%d: a <= b", a le b); printfln("%d: b <= a", b le a);
%d: a <= b <= c a, b, c
%d: c <= b <= a c, b, a
%d: a <= 0 <= b a, 0, b
